Class OrderDAO.CancellationStats

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.OrderDAO.CancellationStats
Enclosing class:
OrderDAO
public static class OrderDAO.CancellationStats extends Object
Represents statistics related to order cancellations.

    • CancellationStats

      public CancellationStats(int pendingCount, int processedToday, BigDecimal refundedToday)
      Constructs a CancellationStats object.
      Parameters:
      pendingCount - The number of pending cancellations.
      processedToday - The number of cancellations processed today.
      refundedToday - The total amount refunded for cancellations today.
